title: Conrad Koh Samui Introduces the Newest Thailand Weekend Escape OfferTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Conrad Koh Samui Introduces the Newest Thailand Weekend Escape Offer
Conrad Koh Samui is offering luxury travellers a new weekend package to discover the amazing Thailand throughout 2015.
The best resort hotel in Thailand at the Asia Pacific Hotel Awards 2014-2015, Conrad Koh
Samui invites guests to escape for a weekend like never before. Guests who book a four-night weekend stay at Conrad Koh Samui and/or Conrad Koh Samui Residences with the resort’s best available rates will receive a complimentary one-night stay, in addition to the three paid nights.
Guests can choose to spend the 4th night for a beach hideaway experience in Koh Samui at Conrad or travel to Bangkok for a one-night weekend stay at Conrad Bangkok to enjoy a city retreat.
During the weekends, guests staying at Conrad Koh Samui can enjoy some complimentary
beachfront activities such as Thai boxing boot camp and beach volleyball on the deck
overlooking the ocean, the poolside local festive games and entertainments, fire dance show
and fireworks, just to name a few. Complimentary daily boat excursions to nearby islands for snorkelling and beach picnic are also available. For younger guests, kids amenities are offered and there will be fun activities for children to participate in.
The resort’s best available rates at Conrad Koh Samui start from THB 24,000 per night for an Ocean-view One-Bedroom Pool Villa (exclusive of taxes and service charge).
